00045 typedef struct  _InstanceData
00046 {
00048         math::matrix4x4 ModelMatrix;
00050         math::vector3d  Color;
00052         float                   Alpha;
00053 
00054         _InstanceData& operator = (const _InstanceData& d)
00055         {
00056                 ModelMatrix = d.ModelMatrix;
00057                 Color = d.Color;
00058                 Alpha = d.Alpha;
00059                 return *this;
00060         }
00061 
00062         _InstanceData(const _InstanceData& d) : ModelMatrix(d.ModelMatrix), Color(d.Color),Alpha(d.Alpha)
00063         {
00064         }
00065         _InstanceData() : ModelMatrix(), Color(1.0,1.0,1.0), Alpha(1.0)
00066         {
00067         }
00068 }       InstanceData; //A per instance data

00123 class RenderingAPIDriver: public core::drivermodel::Driver

00126 protected:
00127         RenderingAPIDriver()
00128         {
00129         }
00130         virtual ~RenderingAPIDriver()
00131         {
00132         }
00133 public:
00134 
00135         //Driver params
00136         virtual EString id() const = 0;
00137         virtual EString getAPIName() const = 0;
00138         virtual EString getShaderAPIName() const = 0;
00139 
00140         //Any combination of render futures
00141         virtual bool    futuresState(unsigned futures) const = 0;
00142         virtual unsigned futures() const = 0;
00143 
00144         //Viewport settings
00145         virtual void setViewport(unsigned width,unsigned height) = 0; //Sets the viewport
00146         //Clearing
00147         virtual void clearColorValue(float r,float g,float b,float a) = 0; //Sets the clear color
00148         virtual void clearColor() = 0;//Clears current color buffer
00149         //Set perspective
00150         virtual void setPerspective(float FieldOfView,float Aspect,float Near,float Far) = 0; //Set perspective projection. FOW is in radians.
00151         virtual void setOrtho(unsigned width,unsigned height,float near = -1.0f,float far = 1.0f) = 0;//Sets orthographic projection
00152         //Depth test
00153         virtual void enableDepthTest() = 0;//enables deth test
00154         virtual void disableDepthTest() = 0;
00155 
00156         virtual void clearDepthValue(float val) = 0;//sets the depth default value
00157         virtual void clearDepth() = 0;//Clears depth
00158 
00159         virtual void depthFunction(unsigned func) = 0;//Func is described in TestFunction namespace
00160         //Stencil test
00161         virtual void enableStencilTest() = 0;
00162         virtual void disableStencilTest() = 0;
00163 
00164         virtual void clearStencilValue(int val) = 0;
00165         virtual void clearStencil() = 0;
00166 
00167         virtual void stencilFunction(unsigned func, int ref, unsigned mask) = 0;//func is compared to ref using mask
00168         virtual void stencilOp(unsigned fail,unsigned zfail,unsigned zpass) = 0;//parameter are decribed in StencilOp namespace
00169         //Alpha test
00170         virtual void enableAlphaTest() = 0;
00171         virtual void disableAlphaTest() = 0;
00172 
00173         virtual void alphaTestFunction(unsigned func, float ref) = 0;
00174         //Alpha blend
00175         virtual void enableAlphaBlend() = 0;
00176         virtual void disableAlphaBlend() = 0;
00177 
00178         virtual void alphaBlendFunction(unsigned sfactor,unsigned dfactor) = 0; //sfactor and dfactor are described in AlphaFunction namespace. for more information refer to openGL specs
00179         //Culling
00180         virtual void enableCulling() = 0;
00181         virtual void disableCulling() = 0;
00182 
00183         virtual void setFrontFace(unsigned FrontFace) = 0;//As described by FrontFace namespace
00184 
00185         virtual void setCullFace(unsigned Face) = 0; //As described by RenderSide namespace
00186         //Polygon offser
00187         virtual void enablePolygonOffset() = 0;
00188         virtual void disablePolygonOffset() = 0;
00189 
00190         virtual void setPolygonOffset(float factor,float units) = 0;
00191         //Matricies
00192         virtual void loadMatrix(const math::matrix4x4& mtx) = 0;//Loades matrix in column form
00193 
00194         virtual void loadIdentityMatrix() = 0;
00195         //Multiplies current matrix in row form
00196         virtual void multMatrix(const math::matrix4x4& mtx) = 0;//Multiplies current matrix in column form
00197 
00198         virtual void pushMatrix() = 0; //Pushes matrix
00199         virtual void popMatrix() = 0;  //Pops matrix
00200 
00201         virtual void setMatrixMode(unsigned mode) = 0; //Sets the matrix mode. Corresponding constants are in enum MatrixMode
00202         //Standart transformations
00203         //diplacements
00204         virtual void translate(float x,float y,float z) = 0; //translates by (x,y,z)
00205         virtual void translate(const math::vector3d& vec) = 0; //translates by vec
00206         //rotation
00207         virtual void rotate(float angle,float x,float y,float z) = 0; //Rotates by angle (in radians) round (x,y,z)
00208         virtual void rotate(float angle,const math::vector3d& vec) = 0;//Rotates by angle (in radians) round vec
00209         virtual void rotate(const math::quaternion& quat) = 0; //Rotates by quaternion (seems to be really slow,but who really cares)
00210         //Scaling
00211         virtual void scale(float x,float y,float z) = 0; //Scales by x,y,z
00212         //Textures
00213         virtual Texture*        createTexture() = 0; //Creates the texture object. Preferably called by the texture manager
00214         virtual void            destroyTexture(Texture* texture) = 0;//Destroys the texture. NB, as always, all allocated objects are freed on driver destroy
00215         //Auto generatio
00216         virtual void            enableGeneration(unsigned coord,unsigned mode) = 0; //enables generation for coord described by TextureCoord with mode descripbed by TextureGenMode
00217         virtual void            disableGeneration(unsigned coord) = 0;

00219         virtual void            setObjectPlane(unsigned coord,const math::vector3d& n) = 0;//Sets the object plane
00220         //VBO (all said above is applicable to functions from this section
00221         virtual VertexBufferObject*     createVertexBufferObject() = 0;
00222         virtual void                            destroyVertexBufferObject(VertexBufferObject*   buf) = 0;
00223         //Rendering commands (all using vbo as data source)
00224         virtual void    drawPrimitive(unsigned primitives,unsigned first,unsigned count) = 0;//Render non-idexed primitive assembled as {primitves},starting from element {first} with count of elements (vertices)
00225         virtual void    drawIndexedPrimitive(unsigned primitives,unsigned count,unsigned type,VertexBufferObject* buf) = 0;//Type is described by DataType
00226         //Same as two above,but with instancing
00227         virtual void    drawPrimitive(unsigned primitives,unsigned first,unsigned count,const InstanceArray& instances) = 0;
00228         virtual void    drawIndexedPrimitive(unsigned primitives,unsigned count,unsigned type,VertexBufferObject* buf,const InstanceArray& instances) = 0;
00229         //Enabling client states (e.g. what array types are supportes
00230         virtual void    enableClientState(unsigned state) = 0;//Enable client state described in ClientState namespace
00231         virtual void    disableClientState(unsigned state) = 0;
00232 
00233         virtual void    enableTextureCoordState(unsigned unit) = 0;
00234         virtual void    disableTextureCoordState(unsigned unit) = 0;
00235         //setting pointer for commands above. stride is an offset between data. Client state must be managed by program
00236         //dataType is described by DataType enum. numComponenets is number of componenet per data unit
00237         //buf - is a valid VBO
00238         virtual void    colorPointer(unsigned dataType,unsigned numComponents,unsigned stride,VertexBufferObject*       buf,unsigned offset = 0) = 0;
00239         virtual void    colorIndexPointer(unsigned dataType,unsigned stride,VertexBufferObject* buf,unsigned offset = 0) = 0;

00241         virtual void    normalPointer(unsigned dataType,unsigned stride,VertexBufferObject*     buf,unsigned offset = 0) = 0;
00242 
00243         virtual void    textureCoordPointer(unsigned unit,unsigned dataType,unsigned numComponenets,unsigned stride,VertexBufferObject* buf,unsigned offset = 0) = 0;//Unit is a texture unit
00244 
00245         virtual void    vertexPointer(unsigned dataType,unsigned numComponenets,unsigned stride,VertexBufferObject*     buf,unsigned offset = 0) = 0;
00246 
00247         virtual void    fogCoordPointer(unsigned dataType,unsigned stride,VertexBufferObject*   buf,unsigned offset = 0) = 0;
00248         //Render mode: side is described by RenderSide namespace. mode is described by RenderMode namespace
00249         virtual void    setRenderMode(unsigned side,unsigned mode) = 0;
00250         //Fog settings (most of this functions are emulated by shader. Nevertheless, they give access to standart fog uniforms
00251         virtual void    enableFog() = 0;
00252         virtual void    disableFog() = 0;
